DESCRIPTION: #yInk is removed from enemies at the end of turn instead of during damage (benefits multi-attacks).
Play a copy of this card for each previous card played this turn (you can't take damage while playing copies).
At the end of your turn, lose HP equal to half your #yBleeding (round up), and then reduce your #yBleeding by that amount.

If your deck contains the associated #yLure card, always spawns in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 #yrare. Cannot spawn through any other method. NL When added to your deck, the corresponding #yLure is removed.

While this is in your deck, it's associated #yPredator card will always spawn in non-boss card rewards that have at least 1 #yrare. NL When the corresponding #yPredator card is added to your deck, remove this from your deck. NL Can only spawn from combat card rewards.
This card cannot be upgraded outside of combat.
Permanently remove this card from your deck.
Prevents the next buff that would be applied to target.
Return a card from your discard pile to your hand and upgrade it.
Select a card from your draw pile and discard it.
The next time this enemy would deal damage, prevent damage equal to the ink value, deal that much damage to the enemy, and then remove that much ink.
This card is not affected by Strength or Dexterity.
